intro.slide1_title: Welcome everybody to Earth Day Group.
intro.slide1_description: A Modern Solution For a Sustainable Society.
intro.according_to_your_location: According to your location EDG will indicate the nearest recycling center and the prices they offer to each type of material.
intro.help_your_planet: Help your planet and your pocket
intro.make_an_extra_income: Make an extra income with your recycling, you can choose who to sell depending on your interest.
intro.give_a_second_change: Give a second change to those objects that you think can help someone else.
